definition: capable of expelling or destroying parasitic worms, a medication capable of causing the evacuation of parasitic intestinal worms
details:
adjective
- capable of expelling or destroying parasitic worms
= synonyms: anthelminthic, helminthic, parasiticidal
noun
- a medication capable of causing the evacuation of parasitic intestinal worms
= synonyms: anthelminthic, helminthic, vermifuge
